name: Shady Business
description:
Shady business - The security of your homeland is under threat! Take control of the plane and destroy the rising threat before it destroys you in this sidescroller shooter! Destroy all opponents who are trying to weave dark intrigues behind the back of the government, attacking civilians.. you are in the video of the pixelated world war 2 dodge and shoot down the invaders trying to get to the capital, shoot down as much as possible and don't die


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics by YOOLOvv
- Nice soundtrack PixelGroud8
